ppc.title: Punishment for murder
ppc.text: Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death, or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine.

ppc.title: Punishment for rape
ppc.text: Whoever commits rape shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which shall not be less than ten years or more than twenty-five years, and shall also be liable to fine.

crpc.title: FIR registration
crpc.text: Every information relating to the commission of a cognizable offence shall be reduced to writing by the officer in charge of the police station.

constitution.title: Equality of citizens
constitution.text: All citizens are equal before law and are entitled to equal protection of law.
